description: I. Responding to emergencies: the UK central government response. Concept of operations. Incl. annexes. 80 p. II. National security strategy: report on progress. 31 p. III. Interim guidance to the economic regulated sectors: water, energy, transport and communication. 24 p. IV. National risk register of civil emergencies. 2010 edition. 60 p. V. Sector resilience plan for critical infrastructure 2010. 33 p. VI. Strategic framework and policy statement on improving the resilience of critical infrastructure to disruption from natural hazards. Incl. annexes. 26 p.
